issue.title: www.macrumors.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.macrumors.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macrumors.com%2F) ### Comment > Hi. This is a new issue I haven't had until today with MacRumors. When I open the web, no images are shown. If I close Safari and open it again, the images remain lost. If I disable AdGuard, all the content from the web page returns. There must be something you or the MacRumors developers have changed that prevents the pics to be shown. Please, investigate it.
